# Crypto Trader

Execute crypto trading and DeFi operations using natural language.

## Getting Started

Install the CLI and authenticate with your API key.

## Capabilities Overview

### Trading Operations

- **Token Swaps**: Buy/sell/swap tokens across chains
- **Cross-Chain**: Bridge tokens between chains
- **Limit Orders**: Execute at target prices
- **Stop Loss**: Automatic sell protection

### Portfolio Management

- Check balances across all chains
- View USD valuations
- Track holdings by token or chain
- Real-time price updates

### Market Research

- Token prices and market data
- Technical analysis (RSI, MACD, etc.)
- Price charts and trending tokens

### Transfers

- Send tokens to external wallets
- Transfer funds between accounts
- Multi-chain support
- Social handle resolution

### Token Deployment

- Deploy new ERC-20 tokens on Base
- Mint and manage token supply
- Sign deployment transactions

### Automation

- Set up recurring trades
- Schedule automated portfolio rebalancing
- Limit order automation

## Safety

- Never share your API key
- Use a dedicated wallet with limited funds
- Start with small test trades
